title: Rice Pudding

ingredients.content: 8 oz white short-grain rice, for pudding

preparations.content: Place milk, sugar and salt into mixing bowl and without measuring cup heat <b>8 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Add rice and without measuring cup cook <b>30 min/195°F//speed 1<b>. Transfer into a serving bowl and allow to rest for 15 minutes. Serve warm or cold.

hintsAndTricks: Sprinkle with sugar, brown sugar or cinnamon sugar, or serve with maple syrup.
Serve with a red berry sauce.
Medium-grain rice can be substituted if short-grain rice is not available.
<b>For chocolate rice pudding:<b> add <b>1-2 tbsp<b> unsweetened cocoa powder while adding rice and proceed as directed by the recipe.

<b>For rich rice pudding:<b> after cooking rice add <b>2 large eggs,<b> lightly whisked, <b>1 tsp homemade<b> vanilla sugar, <b>1 pinch ground<b> cinnamon and <b>1 pinch ground<b> nutmeg (optional) and mix <b>1 min//speed 3.<b> Transfer into a serving bowl and allow to rest as directed by the recipe.
